name: Foundator
body:
Foundator ========= Foundator is a software initiative that aims to provide essential foundational libraries that we feel are missing. Manifesto --------- We shall produce no frameworks, only libraries. Frameworks take control, while libraries give control. We shall make our core libraries simple and straightforward. Complex functionality must be separated from and built on top of simple libraries. All our source code shall be released under a permissive free software license. Libraries ========= Scala ----- In Scala, our libraries live in the `org.foundator` package and Maven group. Our Maven artifactIds are prefixed with `foundator-` because some tools unfortunately require these to be globally unique. | Library | Description | |--------------|-------------| | [json](https://github.com/foundator/json) | A JSON data structure that can be read from or written to a string, stream, writer or file. The focus is on simplicity, good error messages and conformance to the specification. Guidelines ---------- * Don't paste author or licence information into any source files. * Use 4 spaces for indentation. * Put left curly braces on the same line as the statement it belongs to. * Use camelCase. Don't use underscores or screaming case in identifiers. * Avoid abbreviations like "str", "ptr", "obj", etc.
